response.overview: Trapped in a surreal limbo between life and death, a woman must confront her deepest fears and unravel the mystery of her reality by playing a haunting game of hide and seek with a spectral guide, who challenges her to rediscover her identity and the truth behind a tragic accident.
response.tagline: To leave, she must find him. To find him, she must remember.
response.title: Limbo
